text: The Ukrainian Football Association (; UAF) is the governing body of football in Ukraine. It is in charge of the men's and the women's national teams. Before 2019, it was known as the Football Federation of Ukraine (; FFU). The association was founded in 1991. It became a member of FIFA and UEFA in 1992. title: Ukrainian Association of Football
